name: Tanks (itch) (Nothy)
description:
This is kind of a clone of Tanks, a flash game released in 2003 on addictinggames.com.
The purpose of this game is really just to teach myself Unity3D physics a little better.

I'll occasionally update it, though. Two players required until I've got the AI going.
I'm planning to get all the various types of ammo and  upgrades in there as well, because why not?
